LC_E.V.I.L_P1 acceptPlayerMessage: We wish to test you. Your first assignment is on the table. Take it and go.
LC_E.V.I.L_P1 completePlayerMessage: Your next assignment will be to you shortly
LC_E.V.I.L_P1 Task1: Kill any target from 150 meters with a headshot using the AWM while having a VUDU 1x6 scope
LC_E.V.I.L_P1 description: Artem has sent for you. What could he want?
LC_E.V.I.L_P1 note: A challenge for those who dare.
